about.details:
Incorporated in 1973, Swastik Pipe Limited is the manufacturer and exporter of Mild Steel/Carbon Steel ERW Black and Galvanized Pipes, Hallow Steel Pipe, API Pipe, Stainless Steel Tubes, Cold Rolled Steel (CR) Strips/ Coils, Swaged Type Tubular Poles, and Solar Structure.

The company has two plants located at Bahadurgarh, Distt. Jharjjar, Haryana (Unit no.1) and at Kotwan, Kosi Kalan, Distt. Mathura, Uttar Pradesh (Unit No. 2) with an installed capacity, both units aggregating 2,01,250 MT.

Swastik Pipe has diversified its Manufacturing activities towards the production of Solar Module Mounting Structures, Transmission Towers, Steel Tubular Poles and Solar Poles Special Structure for Railways, Scaffolding and Formwork.

Swastik Pipe Ltd is one of the oldest manufacturers and suppliers of steel pipes and tubes to various heavy engineering industries in India and abroad. The company's customers are HPSCSC, SHIMLA, Emanate Pipe Private Limited, Vindhya Telelinks Limited, Harsh Steel Pipes, and SUPER STAR STEELS (P) LTD., among others.

faqs.question: What is the Swastik Pipe IPO?
faqs.answer:
Swastik Pipe IPO is a SME IPO of 6252000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹62.52 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹100 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on September 29, 2022, and closes on October 3, 2022.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Swastik Pipe IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Swastik Pipe IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Swastik Pipe IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Swastik Pipe IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Swastik Pipe IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Swastik Pipe IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Swastik Pipe IPO opens on September 29, 2022 and closes on October 3, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Swastik Pipe IPO?
faqs.answer: Swastik Pipe IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Swastik Pipe IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Swastik Pipe IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Swastik Pipe IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Swastik Pipe IPO will be done on Friday, October 7, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, October 11, 2022. Check the Swastik Pipe IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Swastik Pipe IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Swastik Pipe IPO listing date is on Wednesday, October 12, 2022.
